images.description: These commands take many image inputs. Where it says [url], this can be a url, member ping, uploaded image, or leave it blank to target an image in a previous message.

drawing.description: For the [colour] element, you can use [r][g][b], [#hexcode], or [colourname]

8ball.description: Ask the magic eight-ball a question

account.description: View the minecraft account tied to someones discord

addbannedword.description:
Add a banned word. If severity is left blank, it defaults to 1. Words with other characters instead of letters (such as 'h3110') are automatically handled

Severity 1 - Deletes the message
Severity 2 - Deletes message and warns sender
Severity 3 - Deletes message, warns and mutes sender

addrole.description: Add a role to a mentioned user

artchive.description: Add your artwork to the artchive!

ban.description: Ban a user from the server

bottime.description: See what the current time is for Ewan

cape.description: Get a Minecraft Java users OptiFine cape

head.description: Get a Minecraft Java users Minecraft head

help.description: Get a list of the bots commands and info about each one

imgur.description: Upload an attatched image to Imgur

joinposition.description:
View what position a user joined the server in.
You can also find what member is in a position by entering the number instead of a member

kick.description: Kick a user from the server

kill.description: Kill a user with a Minecraft death message. <member> and [weapon] are optional

love.description: Discover how much you love someone!

movie.description: View the rating and overview about a movie

movieart.description: View the Movie artwork of a specifed Movie

mute.description: Temporarily mute a user, removing their ability to talk in chat. Defaults to 10 minutes if left blank

mutecount.description: Show how many times a user has been muted

mutelist.description: Show a description of every mute a user has had

namesearch.description: Search for users with certain text in their name

packcreator.description: Grants a user the pack creator role

purge.description: Bulk delete messages from a channel. Defaults to 5 if left blank

randomnumber.description: Generates a random number between two numbers

removerole.description: Remove a role from a mentioned user

say.description: Make a character say a message of your choice. [character] is optional

setaccount.description: Tie a minecraft account to your discord, so you can run the Minecraft commands without specifying a user

skin.description: Get a Minecraft Java users Minecraft skin

thumbnail.description: View the Thumbnail of a YouTube video

ticket.description: Create a ticket to talk to the Ban Memberss. Mode can be [create] or [close]

tv.description: View the rating and overview about a TV series

tvart.description: View the TV series artwork of a specifed TV series

uptime.description: Check how long the bot has been running for

userinfo.description: Get info about a desired user

warncount.description: Show how many times a user has been warned

warnlist.description: Show a description of every warn a user has had

mobparts.description: Get a list of bone names for use with OptiFine CEM

setartchive.description: Set the channel for the Artchive command

setlogs.description: Set the channel for the server logs

muteclear.description: Clear a mute from a member

support.description: Request support for the bot. Just send your message after the command and we will get back to you asap

setnotices.description: Set the channel for the bot notices

disablenotices.description: Disable notices from being sent to your server

leave.description: Make the bot leave a voice channel

play.description: Play music into a voice channel. This is a work in progress and is somewhat limited

resetjoin.description: Reset the join positions of all members to be the last time they joined the server

tts.description: Text to speech some text. The [language] is optional

lyrics.description: Find lyrics to a song. Seperate the artist and song name using a semi-colon [;]

dm.description: Direct message someone using the bot

setjoinrole.description: Set a role for members to gain when joining the server

listjoinroles.description: List all the currently set server join roles

removejoinrole.description: Remove a role from the list of server join roles

membercount.description: Display the number of members currently in the server

commandcount.description: Display the number of commands the bot has

setmembercounter.description:
Set a channel to use to display the current member count.
A `!` must be used in the custom text to indicate the number, for example: `e!setmembercount [channelID] Current Members: !`

squarify.description: Squarifies images. The first number is the square size, the second is the size of the gap between them which is removed

palette.description: Show the palette of an image

ellipse.description:
Draw an ellipse on an image.
[x][y] is top left corner, [x2][y2] is bottom right corner

fill.description: Fill a closed on an image with colour

line.description:
Draw a line across an image.
[x][y] is top left corner, [x2][y2] is bottom right corner

pixel.description: Add a single pixel to an image

polygon.description:
Draw a polygon over an image.
[x][y] is the centre of the polygon

rectangle.description:
Draw a rectangle over an image.
[x][y] is top left corner, [x2][y2] is bottom right corner

text.description:
Write text over an image.
The-text-must-use-dashes-instead-of-spaces.
Use the command "text fonts" to show a list of fonts

embed.description:
Send a custom embed using the bot.
All parameters must be seperated with "; ".
Put "none" if you don't want something

define.description: Shows the descriptions of a word

prefix.description: Change the prefix of the bot on your server

band.description: Put some members into a band! Multiple members optional

unband.description: Remove some members from a band! Multiple members optional

monketest.description: Test how much of a monke someone is!

lock.description: Toggle on and off everyone's ability to send messages in a channel

alias.description: Show the aliases for a command

disable.description: Toggle commands being disabled in a server

disabled.description: Show which commands are disabled in a server

leet.description: Convert text to and from Leetspeak

charshift.description: Perform a Caesar Shift on a message by a determined amount

unban.description: Unban a user from the server

marry.description: Marry to members together! If the second member is left blank, you will be that member

pmcpack.description: Find a pack on Planet Minecraft

pmcskin.description: Find a skin on Planet Minecraft

pmcmap.description: Find a map on Planet Minecraft

pmcmember.description: Find a member on Planet Minecraft

mcwiki.description: Search something on the Minecraft Wiki

prefixlessmode.description: Allow for commands to not need a prefix when in DMs

gif.description: Search for a gif on Tenor

randomgif.description: Get a random gif from the first 20 results on Tenor

blockify.description: Turn an image into Minecraft block art!
